TopicTitle: [0.21][Parts Pack]Deep Space Mission Pack - Now open source!

Articles.Content:
Because it contained decompiled game code and I reported it to the moderators. Sorry. I\'m currently re-writing the plugin almost from scratch but the engines are still missing (By looking through MuMech code I found an easy solution, I\'ll try it out today). So don\'t copy the Battery, Solar panel and Ion engine part or your game will crash.

Damn you, now this pack is useless.

Someone is writing his own engine code, I asked him if I can get it, if yes, there will be a new plugin in a few days maximum. You can still use the old plugin if you have it.

(See the \'if\'?)

kockaspiton are you still working on this? It was one of my first mod packs and still is my favorite next to the Ausplane!

My electricity plugin will come soon. I have a 4 day weekend ;P

kockaspiton are you still working on this? It was one of my first mod packs and still is my favorite next to the Ausplane!

My electricity plugin will come soon. I have a 4 day weekend ;P

I haven\'t given up on this pack, but I\'m having lots of exams and projects, so I can\'t really focus on it right now. However if your electricity plugin comes out, I\'ll adjust the pack for it.

The download link isn\'t working the mirror link just leads me to a mediafire ad page. i would recommend posting a link to adfly then to a media fire download page that way you make 5 dollars for every 1000 downloads. 8)

It works for me, but maybe the link is broken because he messed up the url bb codes, copy them out then remove the tags and it should work.

Also, you can get the new version of the Battery, Ion Engine and Solar panel at http://xenolith.ws/?page=mod&id=70
Thanks
Hey the plugin is not there any moar D:<
Updated to use Kreuzung\'s plugin, more content is on its way at the end of May.
So can I remove the example parts now?

So can I remove the example parts now?

It\'s up to you, but to avoid confusion I think that would be the best.
Removed them and linked to this thread instead. I\'m still unsure if you\'ll get the 1k clicks on adf.ly...

Removed them and linked to this thread instead. I\'m still unsure if you\'ll get the 1k clicks on adf.ly...

Don\'t know either, if people complain about it I\'ll remove, anyway thanks for the link and also for the plugin, it looks great . Also if you need some models for any mod you want to make, I\'d be happy to help.
Complain? I clicked so often that they banned my IP? ;P (No, I\'m not hobbyless, klick 'open in new tab' 10 times and you won\'t get ads anymore, only continue links).
I like the spherical command module.
Any chance for a folding solar panel? i would love to fold it back in it\'s place before re-entry

Can i make a request ... I\'ve recently got hooked on the z0xgene mod and the main system part is of the standard diameter....is there a way for you to make a zoo main system that fits your pack

Thanks
Will there ever be an update for KSP version 0.15??? A few parts dont work for this version...
Rename Kreuzung.dll to something that comes after MuMechLib.dll in alphabetical order, should work again then.
I\'ll download just for that spherical Pod. Looks awesome. The other parts aren\'t really my style though.

I\'ll download just for that spherical Pod. Looks awesome. The other parts aren\'t really my style though.

I\'m not really satisfied with the overall quality of the parts either, the spherical pod was my latest creation and its a relatively simple shape. I\'m still learning to use blender, when my finals are over I\'ll redo the whole pack, I\'m confident that I can improve it quite a lot.

I\'m not really satisfied with the overall quality of the parts either

Disagree, I just LOVE the more simple look of them, I honestly hate the whole it-should-look-like-real-even-if-the-engine-doen\'t-allow-it-but-at-least-it\'s-high-poly thing.

One thing I noticed is that it loads slower than other parts, and they seem to be the only triangulated ones I have, is there a link?

Disagree, I just LOVE the more simple look of them, I honestly hate the whole it-should-look-like-real-even-if-the-engine-doen\'t-allow-it-but-at-least-it\'s-high-poly thing.

One thing I noticed is that it loads slower than other parts, and they seem to be the only triangulated ones I have, is there a link?

I intend to keep the lightweight appearance, but with higher resolution textures, and better details. Honestly every texture is based on this image:

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12210338/hull_plating.jpg

I haven\'t noticed the slower load time, only at the first start, thats because I haven\'t included the meshes in the release to save on space, so the game must build them at the first run. But there are a lot of unnecessary clutter on the models nevertheless.

Maybe someone already proposed it but this project 'scream' to be done in kerbal:

http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nautilus-X

Maybe it could be a 'template' for some new picies? i would LOVE to have this sincerely

I\'m not sure if I\'m doing something wrong or there\'s something about 0.15 of KSP, however, I can\'t seem to get my battery for the ion engine to recharge. I finally figured out how to get it to work / recharge in .144, however, with .15, the ion engine will work but never recharge.

If user error I\'d love to know what I\'m doing wrong. I have renamed 'Kreuzung.dll' to 'Zreuzung.dll', but still no luck.
